mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT plan_date, planner_no FROM plan WHERE planner_no=#{plannerNo} ORDER BY PLAN_DATE
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PLAN(plan_no, planner_no, plan_date, content_id) VALUES(plan_seq.NEXTVAL,#{plannerNo},#{planDate},#{contentId})
mapper.select: SELECT p.planner_no, p.plan_date, p.content_id, j.title,j."mapx",j."mapy" FROM plan p INNER JOIN jeju_area j ON p.content_id = j.contentid WHERE planner_no = #{plannerNo} AND plan_date=#{planDate}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM plan WHERE planner_no = #{plannerNo} AND content_id=#{contentId}
